text: I am a man. Over the past two weeks, I have never had little interest or pleasure in doing things. I have felt down, depressed, or hopeless more than half the days. I have had trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much more than half the days. I have never felt tired or having little energy. I have never had poor appetite or overeaten. I have never felt bad about myself — or that I am a failure or have let myself or my family down. I have never had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television. I have never moved or spoken so slowly that other people could have noticed. I have never had thoughts that I would be better off dead or of hurting myself in some way. Do i have depression? Answer with 'Yes' or 'No'
